The Honourable Robert Leith Hanbidge, Lieutenant Governor of the Province of Saskatchewan. May It Please Your Honour: The undersigned has the honour to submit herewith the Public Accounts of the Province of Saskatchewan for the fiscal year ended March 31, 1967. Respectfully submitted, D. G. Steuart, Provincial Treasurer. Regina, Saskatchewan, January, 31, 1968. The Honourable D. G. Steuart, Provincial Treasurer of Saskatchewan. Sir: I have the honour of presenting herewith the Public Accounts of the Province of Saskatchewan for the fiscal year ended March 31, 1967. Respectfully submitted, A. T. Wakabayashi, Deputy Provincial Treasurer. Regina, Saskatchewan, January, 31, 1968.
